title.narrative: Water & Sanitation for improved health outcomes in Odisha

description.narrative: This activity (Water & Sanitation for improved health outcomes in Odisha) is a component of DFID support to Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Programme for Madhya Pradesh & Odisha reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,397,396. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Basic drinking water supply, Basic sanitation. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services. The start date is 01-12-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Water supply and Sanitation - rural sanitation
